item.description:
Thanks especially to all those planning to join us, or share any feedback. After 6pm the room is being used by another group, but we can continue our meeting at another location, preferably with food. So everyone does not need to be there right at 4pm, but we have the room reserved beginning then.. till 6..

 

Jonathan Mark founded Valley 9/11 Truth with Stephen Goodale in 2006. Out first action was a demonstration on the 5th anniversary in Springfield MA at the Federal Building. We later hosted a screening of Loose Change in Northamption at First Churces, Lyman Hall. About a hundred came, and through the years we present programs to inform and help to awaken a new movement for truth and justice.

 

Now after this tenth anniversary, it is time for us renew ourselves, and expand our focus beyond just the events of September 11 and see if we have enough interest and support to continue our efforts in connecting the dots of the military industrial complex and fascism today in the USA.

 

Following discussions we intend to explore possibly creating a new name and committee to work on a Mission Statement to propose to our group. Feel welcome to respond below, even if you can't make it Thursday. One name suggestion is Valley Awakened Progressives - VAP - All ideas are welcome..

 

Jonathan Mark will also update the group on the Citizens 9/11 Commission Campaign and other work related to Senator Mike Gravel. Via telephone I spoke with Senator Grave, George Ripley, Ken Freeland, Ken Jenkins, Byron Belitsos, who are working on the campaign. For background information you can learn more at following resource links posted from Flyby News -

 

10 November 2011 - Youtube - Max Keiser
Senator Mike Gravel
On Occupy and Direct Democracy Evolution!

29 September 2011 - Youtube - Flyby News
Senator Mike Gravel Interview
Part 1 of 8 - Watch on Youtube - 9-20-2011
Full length (88 minute) program is available in high
resolution at Greenfield Community Television
More information at FN-wordpress link!

9/11 Initiative Campaign - Senator Mike Gravel
Citizens 9/11 Commission
This is a new initiative that uses the prevailing ballot
box, to establish a truly independent commission to
pursue justice regarding the events of September 11.
An Actionable Plan for 9/11 Truth and Justice

19 May 2011 - VIDEO - Oakland Forum
Robert M. Bowman Speech Excerpt
Empowering Citizens to End 9/11 Wars

21 October 2011 - Initiative for Democracy - PDF
A Message from Senator Mike Gravel
to the Occupy Wall Street Movement

 

11 September 2011 - Youtube - Toronto Hearings
Senator Mike Gravel: State
Deception in the Past and Today

20 September 2011 - Youtube - Valley 9/11 Truth
Mike Gravel and George Ripley on citizens' campaign

21 September 2011 - WHMP Radio - Bill Newman
Mike Gravel interviewed in Northampton, MA
item.how_to_find_us: Frances Crowe community meeting space, (in back part of Woodstar Cafe building)
item.name: Ten Years After - how to awaken the sheeple
